[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/core](./core.md) &gt; [Client](./core.client.md) &gt; [checkResources](./core.client.checkresources.md)

## Client.checkResources() method

Check a principal's permissions on a set of resources.

**Signature:**

```typescript
checkResources(request: CheckResourcesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): Promise<CheckResourcesResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [CheckResourcesRequest](./core.checkresourcesrequest.md) |  |
|  options | [RequestOptions](./core.requestoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[CheckResourcesResponse](./core.checkresourcesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```typescript
const decision = await cerbos.checkResources({
  principal: {
    id: "user@example.com",
    roles: ["USER"],
    attr: { tier: "PREMIUM" },
  },
  resources: [
    {
      resource: {
        kind: "document",
        id: "1",
        attr: { owner: "user@example.com" },
      },
      actions: ["view", "edit"],
    },
    {
      resource: {
        kind: "image",
        id: "1",
        attr: { owner: "user@example.com" },
      },
      actions: ["delete"],
    },
  ],
});

decision.isAllowed({
  resource: { kind: "document", id: "1" },
  action: "view",
}); // => true
```
